intro.start: To enable developers to use the [[@:console]] to interact with [[@:product.name]],
intro.end: The process of registering these endpoints will make them discoverable for anyone who logs into the [[@:product.console]]. Once you register an endpoint, we recommend connecting it to your account so you can manage it.
intro.admin: To access your cloud native workloads and other related third party services, connect with your personal credentials to the corresponding registered services.
intro.non-admin: To access your cloud native workloads and other related third party services, connect with your personal credentials to the corresponding registered services. Registered services are provided by your systems administrator.

no-endpoints.admin-message-text: to make it available to developers.

register-dialog.title: Register an Endpoint
register-dialog.skip-ssl-label: Skip SSL validation for the endpoint
register-dialog.failure-ssl-notice: {{sllError}}. Please check "Skip SSL validation for the endpoint" if the certificate issuer is trusted
register-dialog.failure-notice: There was a problem creating the endpoint. Please ensure the endpoint address is correct and try again. If this error persists, please contact the administrator.
